replies.author: jokerK
replies.txt_content:
标题: 【搬运】Medieval Fantasy BuildPack作者原文：InMineCreations Medieval Fantasy BuildPack - the result of months of work and cooperative creative. 

26 unique buildings represented as schematics, huge map with 800x800 size, many styles and shapes. All this structures you can use in whatever your purposes.

Thank`s for your attention.

We hope that this project will be a great gift for you in this New Year. We wish you all the best and creativity.

Don`t forget that you can support our team: http://inminecraft.ru/index/donate/0-37#b6



List of buildings

Small house 1
Small house 2
Medium house
Big house 1
Big house 2
Mansion
Bounty hunter house
Carpenter house
Guildhall
Town hall
Library
Storehouse
Forge
Red corporation factory
Church
Museum
Mage Tower
Fort
Jail
Siege camp
Windmill 1
Windmill 2
Coal mine
Iron mine
Gold mine
Lumber mill




About


Attention! You must using this schematics below with with highly caution!




m-coal-mine.schematicm-iron-mine.schematicm-gold-mine.schematicm-lumber-mill.schematic


Their sizes exceed several million blocks because schematics includes buildings and unique landscape.
Use WorldEdit command: //paste -a this will minimize the crushes your server.


翻译： inminecreations中世纪的幻想buildpack -工作和合作创新的月结果。26 unique buildings represented as schematics, huge map with 800x800 size, many styles and shapes. All this structures you can use in whatever your purposes.26独特的建筑为代表的原理图，用800X800规模巨大的地图，许多风格和形状。所有这些结构可以用在你的目的。Thank`s for your attention.谢谢`的引起你的注意。We hope that this project will be a great gift for you in this New Year. We wish you all the best and creativity.我们希望这个项目将在这新的一年给你一个伟大的礼物。我们希望你一切都好，创造力。Don`t forget that you can support our team: http://inminecraft.ru/index/donate/0-37#b6不`别忘了，你可以支持我们的团队：HTTP：/ / inminecraft。Ru /指标/捐赠/ 0-37 # B6----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------List of buildings建筑物的名单Small house 1小房子1Small house 2小房子2Medium house介质的房子Big house 1大房子1Big house 2大房子2Mansion大厦Bounty hunter house赏金猎人的房子Carpenter house木匠的房子Guildhall会馆Town hall市政厅Library图书库Storehouse仓库Forge锻造Red corporation factory红公司工厂Church教堂Museum博物馆Mage Tower法师塔Fort堡Jail监狱Siege camp攻城营地Windmill 1风车1Windmill 2风车2Coal mine煤矿Iron mine铁矿Gold mine金矿Lumber mill木材厂About关于Attention! You must using this schematics below with with highly caution!注意！你必须利用这个原理图如下高度谨慎！m-coal-mine.schematicm-coal-mine.schematicm-iron-mine.schematicm-iron-mine.schematicm-gold-mine.schematicm-gold-mine.schematicm-lumber-mill.schematicm-lumber-mill.schematicTheir sizes exceed several million blocks because schematics includes buildings and unique landscape.它们的大小超过几百万块因为原理图包括建筑和独特的风景。Use WorldEdit command: //paste -a this will minimize the crushes your server.使用worldedit命令：/ /粘贴-这将减少粉碎你的服务器。
